entry.summary: RT Web3Conf India🇮🇳 We present you the coolest member of @developer_dao😎 Yes! It is @dhaiwat10 He is also a DevRel @ankr and will be doing a kick-ass workshop on "building and deploying decentralised web3 frontends" 👀🔥 So glad to host him at Web3Conf 🇮🇳 Mint your tickets now to receive $Dhai 😹

entry.title: RT dcbuilder.eth | dcbuilder.lens🌿: #TestingTheMerge Ropsten. I'm currently running a Lighthouse + Geth validator using eth-docker. The TTD is 5000...
entry.summary: RT dcbuilder.eth | dcbuilder.lens🌿 #TestingTheMerge Ropsten. I'm currently running a Lighthouse + Geth validator using eth-docker. The TTD is 50000000000000000 and the community is targeting for the merge to happen on June 8th, by renting some extra hardware.
